name: SOUTHERN SHRIMP ALLIANCE
sampleDescriptions: Federal administrative and legislative efforts to prevent the illegal importation of shrimp contaminated with illegal antibiotics or other illegal adulteration.
Federal administrative and legislative activities to prevent illegal shrimp imports including implementation of seafood import monitoring program for shrimp imports and related legislation.

Federal administrative and legislative activities affecting the conservation and management of US shrimp fisheries and associated bycatch.  Coast Guard safety regulations and legislation.  Legislation
